languages.text: "Я достаточно уважаю тебя, Вольный Торговец, чтобы не ходить вокруг да около и молвить все как есть. Я бы предпочел биться с тобой плечом к плечу, а не против тебя".
"I respect you enough, Rogue Trader, to speak frankly. I would rather fight shoulder to shoulder with you than stand against you."
languages.original_text: "Я достаточно уважаю тебя, Вольный Торговец, чтобы не ходить вокруг да около и молвить все как есть. Я бы предпочел биться с тобой плечом к плечу, а не против тебя".

traits.locale_text: "I respect you enough, Rogue Trader, to say it as it is without mincing my words. I would rather stand shoulder to shoulder with you in battle than stand against you."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I respect you enough, Rogue Trader, to say it as it is without mincing my words. I would rather stand shoulder to shoulder with you in battle than stand against you."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I respect you enough, Rogue Trader, to speak frankly. I would rather fight shoulder to shoulder with you than stand against you."

languages.text: «Y yo le respeto lo bastante como para hablar con tal franqueza, Comerciante Independiente. Preferiría que luchásemos codo con codo en vez de cara a cara».
languages.original_text: "I respect you enough, Rogue Trader, to speak frankly. I would rather fight shoulder to shoulder with you than stand against you."

traits.locale_text: «Y yo le respeto lo bastante como para hablar con tal franqueza, Comerciante Independiente. Preferiría que luchásemos codo con codo en vez de cara a cara».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我很尊敬你，行商浪人。所以我就直说了吧，我更喜欢与你并肩作战，不喜欢与你为敌。”
languages.original_text: "I respect you enough, Rogue Trader, to speak frankly. I would rather fight shoulder to shoulder with you than stand against you."

traits.locale_text: “我很尊敬你，行商浪人。所以我就直说了吧，我更喜欢与你并肩作战，不喜欢与你为敌。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Je vous respecte assez pour vous parler franchement, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je préférerais combattre à vos côtés plutôt que contre vous. »
languages.original_text: "I respect you enough, Rogue Trader, to speak frankly. I would rather fight shoulder to shoulder with you than stand against you."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous respecte assez pour vous parler franchement, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je préférerais combattre à vos côtés plutôt que contre vous. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「自由開拓者よ、俺はお前を尊敬している。敵対するよりは、肩を並べて戦いたいものだな」
languages.original_text: "I respect you enough, Rogue Trader, to speak frankly. I would rather fight shoulder to shoulder with you than stand against you."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者よ、俺はお前を尊敬している。敵対するよりは、肩を並べて戦いたいものだな」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ich respektiere Euch genug, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, um offen zu sprechen. Ich würde lieber Schulter an Schulter mit Euch kämpfen, als auf der anderen Seite zu stehen."
languages.original_text: "I respect you enough, Rogue Trader, to speak frankly. I would rather fight shoulder to shoulder with you than stand against you."

traits.locale_text: "Ich respektiere Euch genug, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, um offen zu sprechen. Ich würde lieber Schulter an Schulter mit Euch kämpfen, als auf der anderen Seite zu stehen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Sana, seninle samimi konuşacak kadar saygı duyuyorum Hür Tacir. Karşında yer almaktansa seninle omuz omuza savaşmayı yeğlerim."
languages.original_text: "I respect you enough, Rogue Trader, to speak frankly. I would rather fight shoulder to shoulder with you than stand against you."

traits.locale_text: "Sana, seninle samimi konuşacak kadar saygı duyuyorum Hür Tacir. Senin karşında durmaktansa seninle omuz omuza savaşmayı yeğlerim."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
